text: Ricardo Montaner is the first studio album recorded by Argentine-Venezuelan singer-songwriter Ricardo Montaner. It was released by TH-Rodven in early 1987 (see 1987 in music). It reached #1 on the Billboard Latin Pop Albums chart. ==Track listing== Â© MCMLXXXVI. TH-Rodven Records.
